# Test basic token counting

# Test with simple word
tokencount hello.txt
stdout '2 hello.txt'

# Test with multi-word file
tokencount input.txt
stdout '7 input.txt'

# Test with stdin
stdin-tokencount hello.txt
stdout '2 -'

# Test stdin with args
stdin-tokencount hello.txt -verbose
stdout 'Tokens in -: 2'
stdout '2 -'

-- hello.txt --
Hello
-- input.txt --
This is a test file.
